column5: Stay in a large county home in Conroe, TX! Up to 20 guest can be accommodated in this house. The property edge is on the beautiful wooded Egypt Creek which meanders close by! The house is ten minutes away from lake Conroe and 20 minutes from the Woodlands mall. Spacious home with large rooms and beautiful views of nearby trees and occasional deer along the creek.
column8: The Serenity Rose House: Large Home up to 20 ppl
